price: 197. Miyeyna calaamo u ahayn inay culimidii Banii Israa'iil ogaayeen?
arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَكُن لَّهُمۡ ءَايَةً أَن يَعۡلَمَهُۥ عُلَمَٰٓؤُاْ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: awalam yakun lahum āyatan an yaʿlamahu ʿulamāu banī is'rāīla
